UPDATE sec_admin_user
logini_no = #{loginiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
weixinNo = #{weixinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
headImg = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_By_UName = #{createByUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
update_By_Uname = #{updateByUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
sec_group_id = #{secGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE sec_admin_user SET logini_no = #{loginiNo} , mobile = #{mobile} , pwd = #{pwd} , qq = #{qq} , weixinNo = #{weixinNo} , user_name = #{userName} , last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate} , last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp} , headImg = #{headImg} , create_By_UName = #{createByUname} , create_by = #{createBy} , create_date = #{createDate} , update_by = #{updateBy} , update_By_Uname = #{updateByUname} , update_date = #{updateDate} , enable_flag = #{enableFlag} , sec_group_id = #{secGroupId} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
